imdb.plot outline: The stories and human connection to these ghostly, neglected and often dangerous locations are fully explored and artistically resurrected through our team's unique ability to visualize and interpret the beauty in decay. photoXplorers shadows the adventures and pursuits of this unique band of accomplished photographers as they prowl through abandoned buildings and create breathtaking art from the evidence of neglect, decay and merciless time. Forgotten industrial mega-structures and former arenas of public gathering appear as post-modern ghost towns. The Images captured by this talented and charismatic group are beautiful, original and sincere. The photo team is a rare guerrilla art force like none other. photoXplorers invites the viewers to crawl under the barbed wire fences, slip behind the plywood barricades and marvel at the beauty that awaits in the decay.
imdb.title: PhotoXplorers

production companies.name: Keep It In The Family Productions

plot: Follows an adventurous band of photographers/urban explorers as they slip behind the barricades to capture haunting images of abandoned buildings and structures from around the world.::Anonymous

The stories and human connection to these ghostly, neglected and often dangerous locations are fully explored and artistically resurrected through our team's unique ability to visualize and interpret the beauty in decay. photoXplorers shadows the adventures and pursuits of this unique band of accomplished photographers as they prowl through abandoned buildings and create breathtaking art from the evidence of neglect, decay and merciless time. Forgotten industrial mega-structures and former arenas of public gathering appear as post-modern ghost towns. The Images captured by this talented and charismatic group are beautiful, original and sincere. The photo team is a rare guerrilla art force like none other. photoXplorers invites the viewers to crawl under the barbed wire fences, slip behind the plywood barricades and marvel at the beauty that awaits in the decay.::Anonymous
